alert.note: Alert for Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 6:09PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 608 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles south of Akela. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Luna and southwestern Dona Ana Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southern Dona Ana County, Mesilla Valley; Southwest Desert, Mimbres Basin
